document_data.name: Animate Stalactite
document_data.mainbody: '''''Animate stalactite''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Callarduran Smoothhands]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell animated a stalactite to behave similar as a [[piercer]]. The spell remained dormant until triggered by a nearby target. Once triggered, the stalactite dropped from the ceiling of the cave or tunnel in an attempt to pierce the target. At this point, the spell expired. If ''[[dispel magic]]'' was cast upon the stalactite before the spell was activated, the spell expired. The caster could only cast this spell on a single stalactite at any given time.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Callarduran Smoothhands.
